comment: I've been getting a lot of questions from customers about what it's like to be a drag performer . Every time I hand a woman / man who is getting makeup back to them after scanning it . I somehow start a conversation with them about my love for drag I even had this one father daughter

comment: pair in my Lane and I saw this sweet little girl had eyeshadow on . And me being me . I struck up a chat with her about recommended brands she could practice with . But I digress . I'm thankful that I'm showing people that there's more to drag . Than just putting on a wig and makeup
